extended_metaphor.metaphor: both Mid-Ocean Ridges in plate tectonics and Decentralization in money have redundancy as a design principle to ensure continuous generation and expansion
extended_metaphor.mid-ocean_ridges: Mid-Ocean Ridges facilitate the expansion of the Earth's crust by forming new oceanic crust at diverging boundaries, ensuring a constant creation of fresh crust to maintain balance.
extended_metaphor.decentralization: Decentralization in money also employs redundancy by ensuring that transactions are processed on multiple nodes across the network, guaranteeing continuous operation and avoiding central points of failure.

extended_metaphor.metaphor: both Mid-Ocean Ridges in plate tectonics and Decentralization in money exhibit resilience to maintain balance
extended_metaphor.mid-ocean_ridges: Mid-Ocean Ridges help sustain the equilibrium of the Earth's crust by continuously generating new crust at diverging boundaries, contributing to the overall stability of the planet.
extended_metaphor.decentralization: Decentralization in money similarly aids in maintaining balance by distributing control and decision-making across a network of nodes, creating a resilient system that can adapt to disturbances and maintain its functionality.
